product_name: Mission Playground Kumara Merino Top - Women's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: Whether you're enjoying cocoa in front of the fire or a walk in the crisp morning air, the Mission Playground Kumara Merino top offers the cozy warmth of wool with a soft texture your skin will love. Lightweight merino wool is soft and warm, and insulates even when wet; added elastane provides comfortable stretch. Fabric also wicks away moisture, keeping your skin dry and comfortable when you start to sweat. Rib-knit collar and cuffs with snap-button closures; screen-printed floral print on shoulders. Mission Playground Kumara Merino top features a semifitted cut that skims the body without being tight. Closeout.
short_description: Whether you're enjoying cocoa in front of the fire or a walk in the crisp morning air, the Mission Playground Kumara Merino top offers the cozy warmth of wool with a soft texture your skin will love.
